item.description:
Want to try kayaking or canoing ? Join me for an easy paddle up the Merrimack river.
We will meet at Edgewater rentals and rob will bring out the boats. Give him a call at 540-6520 or 485-9251 to reserve your boat. He has paddles and vests for everyone.

We can paddle up to Memorial Field and have lunch at the picnic tables. Come give it a try or bring your friends who haven't tried it yet. It's going to be sunny so bring your sunscreen, water, bathing suit if you want to swim , snacks and of course, your Smiles

Call me if you have any questions 315-0275
Cindy
item.name: Hooksett Paddle
